name: "Abstract (Concentration)" by Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
description: [Various felt pens and brush pens on paper with digital embellishments and minor color manipulation.] As far as abstracts go, this one IS one. Psychic echoes of video-games of the past? I don't know. I'm a fan of "automatic drawing," where I just let the pens go and do whatever they want to do... They wanted to do THIS, apparently...  ---Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
